00022 /**
00023  * @file   apt-mas5.cpp
00024  * @author Alan Williams
00025  * @date   Wed Apr 15 15:29:23 PDT 2009
00026  *
00027  * @brief  wrapper around engine to run MAS5 algos
00028  */
00029 
00030 //
00031 #include "mas5-stat/apt-mas5/MAS5Engine.h"
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/EngineUtil.h"
00034 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00035 #include "util/BaseEngine.h"
00036 #include "util/Fs.h"
00037 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00038 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00039 #include "util/Util.h"
00040 
00041 //
00042 #ifndef WIN32
00043 #include <unistd.h>
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 
00047 /** Everybody's favorite function... */
00048 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) {
00049   ofstream logOut;
00050   LogStream log;
00051   string logName;
00052     
00053   try {
00054     MAS5Engine engine;
00055   
00056     const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00057     const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00058     const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00059     const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00060     
00061     /* Parse options. */
00062     engine.setUsage(
00063                     "apt-mas5 - a program to run the MAS5 algoriths\n"
00064                     "\n"
00065                     "usage:\n"
00066                     "    apt-mas5 .... \n"
00067                     "          *.cel\n"
00068                     );
00069     engine.parseArgv(argv);
00070     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00071     const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());
00072     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00073     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00074     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00075     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00076     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00077     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00078     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00079     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00080     
00081     // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00082     engine.checkOptions();
00083     
00084     /* Set up the logging and message handlers. */
00085     if(!Fs::isWriteableDir(engine.getOpt("out-dir"))) {
00086         if(Fs::mkdirPath(engine.getOpt("out-dir"), false) != APT_OK) {
00087             Err::errAbort("Can't make or write to directory: " + engine.getOpt("out-dir"));
00088         }
00089     }
00090     if(engine.getOpt("log-file") != "")
00091         logName = engine.getOpt("log-file");
00092     else
00093       logName = Fs::join(engine.getOpt("out-dir") , ToStr("apt-mas5.log"));
00094     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00095     log.setStream(&logOut);
00096     Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00097     Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00098     Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00099     
00100     engine.run();
00101   } 
00102   catch(...) {
00103       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00104       // Close log files
00105       logOut.close();
00106       return 1;
00107   }
00108   // Close log files
00109   logOut.close();
00110 
00111   return 0;
00112 }
